articles.title: India confirms Asia’s first monkeypox death
articles.description: The death of a young man in the southern state of Kerala is the first in Asia.
articles.content:
India has confirmed its first monkeypox death, a young man in the southern state of Kerala, in what is only the fourth known death from the disease in the current outbreak.
